amendment.description: To restrict funds made available for IMET assistance for Indonesian military personnel to "Expanded International Military Education and Training" assistance unless certain conditions are met.

vote.text: Amendment SA 200 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 61. Record Vote Number: 19.

action.text: Amendment SA 200 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S1354-1355; text: CR S1354) To restrict funds made available for IMET assistance for Indonesian military personnel to "Expanded International Military Education and Training" assistance unless certain conditions are met.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 200 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 61. Record Vote Number: 19.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 200 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 61. Record Vote Number: 19.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 200 proposed by Senator Feingold.
